name: vercel-deployment-task
description: An Azure Pipelines Task Extension for automatically deploying to Vercel
helpMarkDown: Something not working? Get help here: https://vercel.com/help
author: Vercel

inputs.name: vercelProjectId
inputs.label: Vercel Project ID
inputs.helpMarkDown: The ID of your Vercel Project. Can also be set as the environment variable `VERCEL_PROJECT_ID`.

inputs.name: vercelOrgId
inputs.label: Vercel Org ID
inputs.helpMarkDown: The ID of the Vercel Team your Vercel Project is associated with. Starts with `team_`. Can also be set as the environment variable `VERCEL_ORG_ID`.

inputs.name: vercelToken
inputs.label: Vercel Personal Access Token
inputs.helpMarkDown: A Vercel personal access token with deploy permissions for your Vercel Project (https://vercel.com/guides/how-do-i-use-a-vercel-api-access-token). Can also be set as the environment variable `VERCEL_TOKEN`.

inputs.name: vercelCWD
inputs.label: Vercel Current Working Directory
inputs.helpMarkDown: The working directory the Vercel operations are executed from. Defaults to `System.DefaultWorkingDirectory`.

inputs.name: production
inputs.label: Deploy to Production
inputs.helpMarkDown: Should the task deploy to production? Defaults to false

inputs.name: debug
inputs.label: Enable debug output
inputs.helpMarkDown: Enable `--debug` output for the internal Vercel CLI operations.

inputs.name: archive
inputs.label: Enable compression of the deployment code into a single file before uploading it
inputs.helpMarkDown: Enable `--archive=tgz` flag for the internal Vercel CLI operations.

inputs.name: env
inputs.label: Env vars
inputs.helpMarkDown: Additional environment variables to be provided at runtime. One line per env (e.g. KEY1=value1).

inputs.name: buildEnv
inputs.label: Build env vars
inputs.helpMarkDown: Additional environment variables to be provided during build. One line per env (e.g. KEY1=value1).

inputs.name: logs
inputs.label: Enable build log output in the pipeline
inputs.helpMarkDown: Enable `--logs` flag for the internal Vercel CLI operations.

outputVariables.name: originalDeploymentURL
outputVariables.description: Original URL of the deployment. Can be used to create your own alias in a separate task.

outputVariables.name: deploymentTaskMessage
outputVariables.description: The message output from the deployment. Can be passed to Vercel Azure DevOps Pull Request Comment Task.
